concords.title: Digital Sovereignty Concord
concords.description: Fundamental agreement establishing digital independence and technological sovereignty

content.preamble: By flame and silence, we establish the principles of complete digital sovereignty
articles: Complete control over all digital assets and operations
Sacred protection of the eternal flame of knowledge
Absolute sovereignty over data and information systems
content.sacred_seal: By the eternal flame, this concord is forever binding

concords.title: Council Governance Structure Concord
concords.description: Agreement defining the hierarchical governance structure of the Codex Dominion

content.preamble: Establishing the sacred order of council governance
articles: High Council holds supreme authority over all domains
Elder Council provides wisdom and strategic guidance
Advisory Council manages operational and technical matters
All decisions must align with the eternal flame principles

concords.title: Revenue Crown Financial Sovereignty Concord
concords.description: Agreement establishing complete financial independence and revenue control

content.preamble: Securing absolute financial sovereignty through the Revenue Crown
articles: Complete control over all revenue streams and financial assets
Sacred protection of digital wealth and assets
Transparent tracking of all financial operations
